summary: Two fishermen pick up a psychotic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.
cast: Edmond O'Brien|Frank Lovejoy|William Talman|José Torvay|Sam Hayes|Wendell Niles|Jean Del Val|Clark Howat|Natividad Vacío|Gordon Barnes|Rodney Bell|Orlando Beltran|Wade Crosby|June Dinneen|Joe Dominguez|Henry A. Escalante|Albert Ferrara|Taylor Flaniken|Nacho Galindo|Martin Garralaga|Ed Hinton|Larry Hudson|Jerry Lawrence|George Navarro|Kathy Riggins|Tony Roux|Felipe Turich|Rosa Turich|Collier Young
title: El autoestopista
